item.title: Positano Travel Guide (Amalfi Coast/Salerno (province)/Campania/Southern Italy/Italy/Europe)
item.description: Positano is a charming village on the Amalfi Coast that offers visitors rewarding experiences. Explore its museums, landmarks, and landmarks; hike and bike in its natural wonders; or indulge in its delicious cuisine. Read this guide to know everything about Positano, including places to visit, food and drink scene, cultural practices, safety and health, transportation, and more.
